productos.descripcion: Dual-head sensor designed to look deeper into the groove and achieve much more stable measurement on radiused edges.
Standard 2D solution for borehole measurement (camera with ring light). High durability and optical resolution of 0.05 mm/pixel.
Standard 2.5D triangulation sensor for edge detection and gap & flush measurement (like the DH). High durability and 0.05 mm/pixel.
New generation FFT triangulation sensor replacing the VG6 2.5D; more compact housing and better resolution.
Industrial hub for continuous use in robot gripper. Allows connecting multiple sensors (even of different types) with high availability.
Blue laser scanner (405 nm) with very compact size and high scanning rate for various applications; ideal when space is limited.
Camera with lighting panel for 2D applications. Standard solution for TPC and RGS.
Microcontroller (µC) based solution for various applications; eliminates the need for PC. Usable in RGS (robot guiding system).
Solution for detecting small leaks in pipelines; available in various diameters and with TÜV requirements compliance.
Device with controller, camera, lighting and Nvidia Jetson (CUDA/GPU). For AI Check, AI Ident and AI Pick. No PC required.
Identifies components and verifies presence/position according to defined characteristics, using AI routines for a stable system.
Verifies if parts are present and geometrically correct, using AI algorithms.
Identifies parts and sends their position and rotation to a robot for picking, based on artificial intelligence.
Basic FFT scanning solution: the sensor is guided over the component or the robot guides the component under the fixed sensor. Examples: BeadControl, HemQC.
3D scanning of adhesive bead to detect position, width and height during the process, without losing cycle time.
Controls hemming quality during the rolling process by measuring fold width and height; can measure adhesive exudation.
Calculates the ideal mounting position of a component relative to its opening considering tolerances; compensates for mechanical fitting behavior.
System that determines body deviations in a single station for subsequent optimization, assuming stable positioning at each station.
Guides the robot to an ideal calculated position (instead of taught) from 2D/2.5D images (hole positions, edges).
Fast and accurate optical quality control of large components in automated processes; high speed and flexibility for different variants.
Checks presence of components and features in 2D/2.5D; detects failures in early stages of the process.
Automatic robot-based solution for stable gap and flush measurement; ideal with the FFT DH sensor.
